detail_desc: Jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a strap and adjustable fastener at the front. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Mules with a wide foot strap, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey tops in various designs.
Over-the-knee socks in a soft, fine knit containing some wool.
Sleeveless top in soft viscose jersey with a lace yoke at the front.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit wool and nylon blend.
Joggers in soft denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, open back pocket and tapered legs.
Sunglasses with plastic frames with decorative appliqués and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, elastication at the top of the back and gathered tiers to create width. Unlined.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit wool and nylon blend.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Cycling shorts in stretch nylon jersey with a sheen. High waist with covered elastication.
Padded gilet with a detachable faux-fur trimmed hood lined with soft pile. Stand-up collar, side pockets and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow, sewn-in ties that fasten at one side, and a wrapover skirt.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif and ribbed neckline.
Long, airy top in soft jersey with long sleeves, visible seams and an asymmetric cut to the raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Cropped top in jersey with a sheen. Draped neckline at the front and elastic spaghetti shoulder straps.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, organic cotton corduroy with patch front pockets, straps with adjustable buttoning, and a button at the sides. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y). Jersey lining at the top.
Small shoulder bag in soft, grained imitation leather. A flap with a metal fastener and a narrow, metal chain shoulder strap. Unlined. Size approx. 7.5x16.5x19.5 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, shaping seams at the knees and narrow hems.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a deep V-neck. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a wide, elasticated hem. Medium support.
Kaftan-style tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Tie belt at the waist and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist, a high slit at the front and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Imitation suede mules with large pompoms on the front, pointed toes and small, covered wedge heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, a high collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy textured weave with embroidery on the front. Collar, concealed buttons at the front and 3/4-length, flounced sleeves.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a woven wool blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
Imitation leather slides. Two straps, one with a buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit, all-in-one pyjamas and triangular scarf in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Pyjamas with short sleeves, short legs and press-studs down the front. Triangular scarf with press-studs at the back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Treggings in stretch imitation leather with an elasticated waist and seams on the legs. Soft inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with a round neck and frills down the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Briefs in lace and mesh with a high, elasticated waist, lined gusset and string back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with gently dropped shoulders, a decorative seam at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a low, ribbed waistband and straight, wide legs.
Sleeveless top in a cotton weave with a square neckline and shoulder straps with flounce trims that continue down the front and back. Buttons down the front and wide smocking at the back. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a boat neck, dropped shoulders and zip at the back.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood and zip with a chin guard at the front. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with short cap sleeves and a twisted trim around the neckline.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and slits in the sides. No buttons.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a lace yoke, opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a high waist and a zip fly and button.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative frill over the shoulders.
Short shorts in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with quilted sections on the knees.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in jersey with short sleeves, a sewn-in wrapover at the top and decorative ties at one side. Unlined.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Lined hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a motif, gently dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck and rounded hem.
CONSCIOUS Shorts in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and kangaroo pocket at the front.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a frill-trimmed grandad collar, frilled button placket, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuss with a frill trim.
Long metal earrings with fabric tassels. Length 15 cm.

Calf-length dress in patterned chiffon with a V-neck, narrow smocking at the shoulders, under the bust and at the back, and short puff sleeves. Shorter, V-neck jersey underdress with narrow shoulder straps.

Pyjamas with a short, wide top and pair of shorts in soft waffled jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and trims around the neckline and cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist.

Short, boxy jacket in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, high collar and zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, wide neckline and short cap sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Wide blouse in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a wide, elasticated neckline and opening with ties at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
KATE MORGAN x H&M. T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, narrow ribbing around the neckline and a small appliqué at the hem.
Set with a top and skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top that is rounded and slightly longer at the back. Tiered skirt with an elasticated waist.
Bell-shaped skirts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide elastic waistband. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wide panel at the top, side pockets and fold-down cuffs at the hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Socks in a rib-knit cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Blouse in an airy weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, open chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long, sleeveless dress in patterned chiffon with elastication at the top, narrow, braided shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and wide skirt. Lined.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Short coat in a woven wool blend with a high stand-up collar with press-studs and a concealed zip down the front. Zipped side pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in crinkled chiffon with a frilled collar, and an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Smocking and frills at the cuffs and hem.
